metadata.title: CVE-2023-4427 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.110allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
